resource: 1003133.vtc=true 1003133.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003133.1002622.description=Driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt reminder buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelts reminder sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 9 mph (15 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will continue to sound. 1003133.description=Driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt reminder buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelts reminder sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 9 mph (15 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will continue to sound.
